name: Looking for Love (in all the wrong deserts)
name_original: Looking for Love (in all the wrong deserts)
description:
(Play on mobile in fullscreen mode and landscape orientation for best results.)

Wander a vast-ish desert in search of that crazy little thing the legends call "love."

While playing on mobile, use gyro aim  (think of your phone as a window) to look around your surroundings, and tap the screen to start and stop walking. Find love to win, I guess?

A performance art submission for the Collective's strangely-named "Talent Show and Date Auction."
